divs: sighting detailsi was in my driveway having a cigarette and looking at the stars and noticed that an airplane was coming in from the east and coming directly over (which is normal because i live about 2 miles from an airport) but thought it looked akward. instead of just the red flashing light it also looked like it had a white light on the front. as it came closer it seemed like a single cylindrical-shaped aircraft (because of the altitude i could only see the lights) and also seemed to rotate counter-clockwise but passed under a few stars which i could see between the two lights, showing me that it was actually two aircraft ( one distinctly being an airplane). as they went directly above me i watched the single white light circle the plane 1 1\2 times then quickly darted in front again, lead for a few seconds, then make a hard right turn and accelerate up and to the northwest before disappearing. i also noticed that the faint sound of the jet was all that i heard, not anything unusual like i would have expected, just the sound of a single aircraft. the object moved swiftly and fluidly and did not flash. i am very excited to have seen this as this is the fourth time in my life that i have seen a ufo and i hope to see more! also the airplane did not land here but kept going in the general direction towards seattle from lewiston.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lewiston
There were no other sightings in Lewiston on or around November 8th 2010
Summary: A single white light flew in front of a commercial airliner, circled, continued to lead, turned hard right and ascended quickly to northwest then vanished
